title: Graph of circuit elements over time with inductor

content.prompt:
Which of the following quantities could be represented as a function of time by the graph shown above?

  1. The potential difference across the resistor

  2. The potential difference across the inductor

  3. The current in the circuit

topic.text: 13.5: Circuits with Resistors and Inductors (LR Circuits)

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
